item.title: 8 Ways To Create Flow According to Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi
item.description: Want to increase your well-being, creativity, and productivity? If so, you might want to cultivate flow, a concept describing those moments when you’re completely absorbed in a challenging but doable task. Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi, considered one of the co-founders of positive psychology, was the first to identify and research flow. (If you’re not sure how to pronounce his name, here’s a phonetic guide: “Me high? Cheeks send me high!”) “The best moments in our lives are not the passive, receptive, relaxing times .
